info.description: A RESTful webservice to retrieve data about the operational state of public elevators and escalators in german railway stations.
info.title: FaSta - Station Facilities Status

get.description: Access to public facilities (escalators and elevators) in railway stations

parameters.description: Number of the station the facilities belong to.
parameters.name: stationnumber

parameters.description: Geo coordinate rectangle in WGS84-format to filter facilities by geographical position. Parameters must be 4 numbers exactly as follows: longitudeWest, latitudeSouth, longitudeEast, latitudeNorth.
parameters.name: area

400.description: The given filters contained invalid values.

406.description: The requested representation format is not available.

503.description: The service has been disabled temporarily.

get.description: Returns the facility identified by its equipmentnumber.

parameters.description: Equipmentnumber of the facility to fetch.
parameters.name: equipmentnumber

404.description: The requested facility could not be found.

406.description: The requested representation format is not available.

503.description: The service has been disabled temporarily.

get.description: Returns information about a station (and its corresponding facilities) identified by a stationnumber.

parameters.description: Number of the station to fetch.
parameters.name: stationnumber

404.description: The requested station could not be found.

406.description: Requested representation format is not available.

503.description: The service has been disabled temporarily.

facility.description: A facility provided by this API is either a public elevator or escalator located at a German railway station.

geocoordX.description: Longitude component of geocoordinate in WGS84 format.

geocoordY.description: Latitude component of geocoordinate in WGS84 format.

operatorname.description: The name of the operator of the facility.

stationnumber.description: Number of the station the facility belongs to.
